scripts.release: yarn build && yarn test && yarn site && yarn bump ${0}
scripts.bump: yarn workspaces foreach -A version ${0} && git commit -am "v${0}" && git tag v${0} && echo 'do not forget to "git push --tags origin main" to update docs and release new version
scripts.site: yarn docs && yarn build && yarn workspace @skibididrizz/site build-site
